name: Orbhead
description:
Survive as many waves of floating head demons as possible in this fast-paced arena survival shooter. Use your 270 degree field of view to your advantage and fend off the demonic invasion on the top of an arcane tower.

This is our entry for the 7dayfps jam 2021.

Controls: WASD + Mouse, ESC for pause & settings

We hope you enjoy it!

- Fabian Schaub & Paul Lawitzki
